channel.title: blockquote on green | hugo-scratch-1 | 0013
channel.description: Recent content in blockquote on green | hugo-scratch-1 | 0013

item.title: Blockquote
item.description: the problem In hugo-scratch-1, using the markdown for blockquote, which is: > followed by space at the start of a line there was no formatting of any kind. what html is hugo generating? Understanding what HTML is generated is the starting point, so a simple View Page Source shows that BLOCKQUOTE start and end tags are being generated. So either the default CSS or the generated CSS is not set up for BLOCKQUOTE.
